answerText: air masses[10] The most common type of this front occurs when a cold front overtakes a warm front. On weather maps, it is designated by a solid purple line or by a line with alternating semicircles and triangles.

subject: Science
question: Question: These things are classified as polar or tropical and continental or marine, based on their source region. [10] Identify these homogenous bodies of air that are separated by fronts.
